00036 /// Simple implementation of the FrequencyEstimator interface. 
00037 class FrequencyEstimatorSimple : public FrequencyEstimator
00038 {
00039     public:
00040 
00041     enum Type {LocalMax, Parabola, Lorentzian};
00042 
00043     /// create an instance
00044     static std::auto_ptr<FrequencyEstimatorSimple> create(Type type = Parabola,
00045                                                           unsigned int windowRadius = 1);
00046                                                          
00047     /// \name FrequencyEstimator interface
00048     //@{
00049     virtual Peak estimate(const FrequencyData& fd, 
00050                           const Peak& initialEstimate) const = 0; 
00051     virtual ~FrequencyEstimatorSimple(){}
00052     //@}
00053 };
